message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $7000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $8200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $8100.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7800. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you a final concession. I can sell the product to you for $8050.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a deal, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7800. Can you consider that?
